person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: ASEAN groups Brunei , Indonesia , Malaysia , the Philippines , Singapore , Thailand and Vietnam .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Brunei |
| Indonesia |
| Malaysia |
| the Philippines |
| Singapore |
| Thailand |
| Vietnam |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Brunei |
| Indonesia |
| Malaysia |
| the Philippines |
| Singapore |
| Thailand |
| Vietnam |

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to countries and are therefore considered "Person" entities in this context, according to the given definition. The paragraph mentions "ASEAN groups" the countries, so the countries themselves are the entities being referred to.
